content: Irene Pepperberg, a researcher at Northwestern University, is discovering that a parrot can not only mimic people but also learn the meaning of words.
translations: ita:Irene Pepperberg, una ricercatrice presso la Northwestern University, sta scoprendo che un pappagallo pu√≤ non solo imita
